Reviews.Title: in love with this product.
Reviews.Author: Erin MAgill
Reviews.Content: love the touch screen but my favorite is having the keyboard instead of texting with touchscreen. the only problem is that it has trouble with applications like snapchat

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: andreatb101
Reviews.Content: I'm not a tech lover and primarily use a phone for calls, texts, email and web info. This phone is great and easy to use. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: nconnor
Reviews.Content: Came in great condition wrapped and sealed nicely.Phone works good.didnt come with sim card or sd card though although was able to setup phone without the sim card

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: tonye
Reviews.Content: excellent phone came brand new and clean with all accessories as promised very pleased with the keyboard as a former blackberry user would urge others to try this phone

Reviews.Title: key pad
Reviews.Author: Cliff H McLeod Jr
Reviews.Content: several letter key pads are scratched and they cause duplication when used for texting. Looks like it was hit or dropped to damage the group of key pads.
